lines.text: How are we gonna get in pictures? We don't know nothin' about makin' movies!
There's a couple of thousand people in pictures now who know nothing about it. Three more won't make any difference.
I quit!
You can't quit.
Why not?
You're fired.
Hey, you can't fire him.
Why not?
He quit.
[Moe slaps him]
Boy, this picture business is tougher to get into to than I figured.
Don't worry, a bad beginning is a good ending.
Soitenly! If at first you don't succeed, keep on suckin' til you do suck seed.
Cut, cut, cut. You ain't shooting the picture right.
Why, what's the matter with it?
There's no action. It was no good from the first kiss.
Kiss? What do you know about kisses?

[turns to Curly]
Tell him what we know about kisses.
Uh...
That's enough!
